thread.title: Ruth B. Is Only Interested in the Real Deal With 'Superficial Love' Lyric Video: Exclusive Premiere
thread.title_full: Ruth B. Is Only Interested in the Real Deal With 'Superficial Love' Lyric Video: Exclusive Premiere

author: Alexa Shouneyia
title: Ruth B. Is Only Interested in the Real Deal With 'Superficial Love' Lyric Video: Exclusive Premiere
text:
Jacqueline Di Milla Ruth B 
Ruth B. just shared the lyric video for her bubbly new tune “Superficial Love” and it’s premiering exclusively on Billboard . 
Impressing both with her flawless vocals and sharp skills on the keyboard, the songstress drops heartfelt lines like, “This superficial love thing got me goin’ crazy/ Baby, if you want me then you better need me/ ‘Cause I’m so done not being your number one” 
The colorful video features lyrics to the track flowing in and out of the frame with frequent color scheme changes and fun visuals that vibe with the lyrical content. It’s an upbeat number that sounds like Ruth is happily letting you know that she’s only down with the real. 
Speaking on the track, Ruth B. tells Billboard , "It's about letting go of things that don't matter and discovering yourself in the process. Loving yourself for who you are and demanding the same authenticity in all of your relationships". 
Watch out the “Superficial Love” lyric video here:
